name: English - US
sampleSentence: The quick brown fox jumps over 12 lazy dogs for $90 while wearing Nike shoes.

name: English - UK
sampleSentence: The quick brown fox jumps over 12 lazy dogs for £90 while wearing Nike shoes.

name: Spanish (Español)
sampleSentence: El veloz zorro marrón salta sobre 12 perros perezosos por $90 mientras usa tenis Nike.

name: Spanish - Spain (Español - España)
sampleSentence: El veloz zorro marrón salta sobre 12 perros perezosos por 90 € mientras lleva zapatillas Nike.

name: Spanish - Mexico (Español - México)
sampleSentence: El veloz zorro marrón salta sobre 12 perros perezosos por $90 mientras usa tenis Nike.

name: Spanish - Argentina (Español - Argentina)
sampleSentence: El veloz zorro marrón salta sobre 12 perros perezosos por $90 mientras usa zapatillas Nike.

name: French - France (Français - France)
sampleSentence: Le renard brun rapide saute par-dessus 12 chiens paresseux pour 90 € tout en portant des baskets Nike.

name: French - Canada (Français - Canada)
sampleSentence: Le renard brun rapide saute par-dessus 12 chiens paresseux pour 90 $ tout en portant des espadrilles Nike.

name: Portuguese - Brazil (Português - Brasil)
sampleSentence: A rápida raposa marrom pula sobre 12 cães preguiçosos por R$ 90 enquanto usa tênis Nike.

name: Portuguese - Portugal (Português - Portugal)
sampleSentence: A rápida raposa castanha salta sobre 12 cães preguiçosos por 90 € enquanto usa sapatilhas Nike.

name: German - Germany (Deutsch - Deutschland)
sampleSentence: Der schnelle braune Fuchs springt über 12 faule Hunde für 90 €, während er Nike-Schuhe trägt.

name: Italian (Italiano)
sampleSentence: La rapida volpe marrone salta sopra 12 cani pigri per 90 € indossando scarpe Nike.

name: Dutch - Netherlands (Nederlands - Nederland)
sampleSentence: De snelle bruine vos springt over 12 luie honden voor € 90 terwijl hij Nike-schoenen draagt.

name: Chinese Simplified (中文简体)
sampleSentence: 那只敏捷的棕色狐狸穿着 Nike 鞋跃过 12 只懒狗，售价 90 元。

name: Chinese Traditional (中文繁體)
sampleSentence: 那隻敏捷的棕色狐狸穿著 Nike 鞋躍過 12 隻懶狗，售價 90 元。

name: Japanese (日本語)
sampleSentence: 素早い茶色のキツネはNikeの靴を履いて12匹の怠け者の犬を飛び越え、価格は90円です。

name: Korean (한국어)
sampleSentence: 재빠른 갈색 여우가 Nike 신발을 신고 12마리의 게으른 개를 뛰어넘고, 가격은 90원입니다.

name: Arabic (العربية)
sampleSentence: الثعلب البني السريع يقفز فوق ١٢ كلبًا كسولًا مقابل ٩٠ دولارًا وهو يرتدي أحذية Nike.

name: Hebrew (עברית)
sampleSentence: השועל החום הזריז קופץ מעל 12 כלבים עצלנים תמורת 90 ₪ כשהוא נעול נעלי Nike.

name: Persian (فارسی)
sampleSentence: روباه قهوه‌ای چابک در حالی که کفش‌های Nike پوشیده است از روی ۱۲ سگ تنبل با قیمت ۹۰ ریال می‌پرد.

name: Urdu (اردو)
sampleSentence: تیز بھورا لومڑی Nike جوتے پہن کر ۱۲ سست کتوں کے اوپر سے ۹۰ روپے میں چھلانگ لگاتا ہے۔

name: Russian (Русский)
sampleSentence: Быстрая коричневая лиса перепрыгивает через 12 ленивых собак за 90 ₽ в кроссовках Nike.

name: Ukrainian (Українська)
sampleSentence: Швидка коричнева лисиця перестрибує через 12 ленивих собак за 90 ₴ у кросівках Nike.

name: Polish (Polski)
sampleSentence: Szybki brązowy lis przeskakuje nad 12 leniwymi psami za 90 zł w butach Nike.

name: Turkish (Türkçe)
sampleSentence: Hızlı kahverengi tilki, Nike ayakkabılarıyla 90 ₺ karşılığında 12 tembel köpeğin üzerinden atlar.

name: Czech (Čeština)
sampleSentence: Rychlá hnědá liška skáče přes 12 líných psů za 90 Kč v botách Nike.

name: Hungarian (Magyar)
sampleSentence: A gyors barna róka Nike cipőben ugrik át 12 lusta kutyán 90 Ft-ért.

name: Romanian (Română)
sampleSentence: Vulpea maro rapidă sare peste 12 câini leneși pentru 90 lei purtând pantofi Nike.

name: Bulgarian (Български)
sampleSentence: Бързата кафява лисица прескача 12 мързеливи кучета за 90 лв., носейки обувки Nike.

name: Kazakh (Қазақша)
sampleSentence: Жылдам қоңыр түлкі Nike аяқ киімін киіп, 12 жалқау итті 90 ₸ бағасымен секіріп өтеді.

name: Thai - Thailand (ภาษาไทย - ประเทศไทย)
sampleSentence: สุนัขจิ้งจอกสีน้ำตาลผู้รวดเร็วกระโดดข้ามสุนัขขี้เกียจ ๑๒ ตัว ในราคา ๙๐ บาท ขณะสวมรองเท้า Nike

name: Vietnamese (Tiếng Việt)
sampleSentence: Con cáo nâu nhanh nhẹn nhảy qua 12 con chó lười biếng với giá 90 ₫ trong khi mang giày Nike.

name: Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia)
sampleSentence: Rubah cokelat yang cepat melompat di atas 12 ekor anjing pemalas seharga Rp 90 sambil mengenakan sepatu Nike.

name: Hindi (हिन्दी)
sampleSentence: तेज भूरी लोमड़ी Nike जूते पहनकर १२ आलसी कुत्तों के ऊपर से ₹९० में कूदती है।

name: Bengali - Bangladesh (বাংলা - বাংলাদেশ)
sampleSentence: দ্রুত বাদামী শেয়াল Nike জুতো পরে ১২টি অলস কুকুরের উপর দিয়ে ৳৯০ টাকায় লাফ দেয়।

name: Bengali - India (বাংলা - ভারত)
sampleSentence: দ্রুত বাদামী শেয়াল Nike জুতো পরে ১২টি অলস কুকুরের উপর দিয়ে ₹৯০ টাকায় লাফ দেয়।

name: Tamil (தமிழ்)
sampleSentence: வேகமான பழுப்பு நரி Nike காலணிகளை அணிந்துகொண்டு 12 சோம்பேறி நாய்களை ₹90க்கு தாண்டுகிறது.

name: Telugu (తెలుగు)
sampleSentence: వేగవంతమైన గోధుమ రంగు నక్క Nike బూట్లు ధರಿಸಿ 12 సోమరి కుక్కలపై ₹90కి దూకుతుంది.

name: Punjabi - Gurmukhi (ਪੰਜਾਬੀ)
sampleSentence: ਤੇਜ਼ ਭੂਰੀ ਲੂੰਬੜੀ Nike ਜੁੱਤੇ ਪਾ ਕੇ 12 ਆਲਸੀ ਕੁੱਤਿਆਂ ਦੇ ਉੱਪਰੋਂ ₹90 ਵਿੱਚ ਛਾਲ ਮਾਰਦੀ ਹੈ।

name: Malay (Bahasa Melayu)
sampleSentence: Musang coklat yang pantas melompat ke atas 12 ekor anjing yang malas dengan harga RM 90 sambil memakai kasut Nike.

name: Filipino (Tagalog)
sampleSentence: Ang mabilis na kayumangging soro ay tumalon sa ibabaw ng 12 tamad na aso sa halagang ₱90 habang nakasuot ng sapatos na Nike.

name: Swahili (Kiswahili)
sampleSentence: Mbweha wa hudhurungi mwenye kasi anaruka juu ya mbwa 12 wavivu kwa KSh 90 akiwa amevaa viatu vya Nike.

name: Amharic (አማርኛ)
sampleSentence: ፈጣኑ ቡናማ ቀበሮ ናይክ ጫማ አድርጎ በ፲፪ ሰነፍ ውሾች ላይ በ፺ ብር ይዘላል።

name: Zulu (isiZulu)
sampleSentence: Impungushe ensundu esheshayo yeqa izinja ezivilaphayo ezingu-12 ngo-R90 igqoke izicathulo zakwa-Nike.

name: Yoruba (Yorùbá)
sampleSentence: Kọlọkọlọ pupa yiyara fo lori awọn aja ọlẹ 12 fun ₦90 lakoko ti o wọ bata Nike.

name: Afrikaans
sampleSentence: Die vinnige bruin vos spring oor 12 lui honde vir R90 terwyl hy Nike-skoene dra.

name: Swedish (Svenska)
sampleSentence: Den snabba bruna räven hoppar över 12 lata hundar för 90 kr medan den bär Nike-skor.

name: Danish (Dansk)
sampleSentence: Den hurtige brune ræv springer over 12 dovne hunde for 90 kr., mens den har Nike-sko på.

name: Norwegian - Bokmål (Norsk - Bokmål)
sampleSentence: Den raske brune reven hopper over 12 late hunder for 90 kr mens den har på seg Nike-sko.

name: Finnish (Suomi)
sampleSentence: Nopea ruskea kettu hyppää 12 laiskan koiran yli 90 €:lla Nike-kengät jalassa.

name: Estonian (Eesti)
sampleSentence: Kiire pruun rebane hüppab üle 12 laisa koera 90 € eest, kandes Nike jalatseid.

name: Latvian (Latviešu)
sampleSentence: Ātrā brūnā lapsa pārlec pāri 12 slinkiem suņiem par 90 €, valkājot Nike apavus.

name: Lithuanian (Lietuvių)
sampleSentence: Greita ruda lapė peršoka per 12 tingių šunų už 90 € avėdama Nike batus.

name: Greek (Ελληνικά)
sampleSentence: Η γρήγορη καφέ αλεπού πηδά πάνω από 12 τεμπέλικα σκυλιά για 90 €, φορώντας παπούτσια Nike.

name: Gujarati (ગુજરાતી)
sampleSentence: ઝડપી કથ્થઈ શિયાળ Nike શૂઝ પહેરીને ૧૨ આળસુ કુતરાઓ પર ₹૯૦ માં કૂદી જાય છે.

name: Kannada - India (ಕನ್ನಡ - India)
sampleSentence: ವೇಗದ ಕಂದು ನರಿ Nike ಶೂಗಳನ್ನು ಧರಿಸಿ ೧೨ ಸೋಮಾರಿ ನಾಯಿಗಳ ಮೇಲೆ ₹೯೦ ಕ್ಕೆ ಜಿಗಿಯುತ್ತದೆ.

name: Malayalam (മലയാളം)
sampleSentence: വേഗത്തിലുള്ള തവിട്ട് കുറുക്കൻ Nike ഷൂസ് ധരിച്ച് 12 മടിയൻ നായ്ക്കൾക്ക് മുകളിലൂടെ ₹90-ന് ചാടുന്നു.

name: Irish (Éireannach)
sampleSentence: Léimeann an sionnach donn tapa thar 12 madra leisciúla ar €90 agus bróga Nike á gcaitheamh aige.

name: Maltese (Malti)
sampleSentence: Il-volpi kannella mgħaġġla taqbeż fuq 12-il kelb għażżien għal €90 waqt li tkun liebsa żarbun Nike.

name: Slovak (Slovenčina)
sampleSentence: Rýchla hnedá líška skáče cez 12 lenivých psov za 90 € v topánkach Nike.

name: Croatian (Hrvatski)
sampleSentence: Brza smeđa lisica preskače 12 lijenih pasa za 90 € noseći Nike tenisice.

name: Slovenian (Slovenščina)
sampleSentence: Hitra rjava lisica skoči čez 12 lenih psov za 90 € v Nike čevljih.

name: Marathi (मराठी)
sampleSentence: वेगवान तपकिरी कोल्हा Nike शूज घालून १२ आळशी कुत्र्यांवरून ₹९० मध्ये उडी मारतो.
